traceability.evidence: The feature is covered by comprehensive tests: - test/cli.flags.test.js verifies that --min-age is accepted, rejects invalid/non-numeric/out-of-range values, defaults to 7, and overrides default when provided. - test/cli.config-file.test.js verifies reading minAge from .dry-aged-deps.json, rejecting invalid JSON or out-of-range values, handling missing custom config file, and CLI flags overriding config values. - bin/dry-aged-deps.js --help output includes the --min-age option with correct description. - JSON output (via --format=json) summary.thresholds.prod.minAge and .dev.minAge reflect the applied threshold. - Source code in src/cli-options.js, cli-options-helpers.js, and config-loader.js implements parsing, validation, defaulting, and precedence as specified.
traceability.notes: All acceptance criteria for the configurable age threshold story are satisfied: CLI flag support, config file support with precedence, validation, default behavior, help documentation, and output indication of applied threshold.
